comment.text: This translation key is used to display a button label that opens an editor for an organization in the same tab. When translated, it should be read as "Open {organizationName} editor in same tab". The translation appears on a toggle button within a UI element.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a direct transliteration of 'editor'. While understandable, a more natural Azerbaijani word for 'editor' might be preferable depending on the context. Consider 'redaktoru' or a more contextually appropriate term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'redaktorunu' with a more natural Azerbaijani equivalent for 'editor' based on the specific context, such as 'redaktoru' or 'proqramını'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Отворете редактора на {{organizationName}} в същия раздел' is not a direct or natural translation of "Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab".  'Раздел' translates to 'section' or 'panel', not 'tab'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Отворете редактора на {{organizationName}} в същия таб

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Otevřít editor {{organizationName}} na stejné kartě' isn't the most natural or precise way to express 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab'.  A better translation would more closely reflect the intent of opening the editor within the current tab, rather than just being 'on the same card'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otevřít editor {{organizationName}} v záložce

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a hyphen where a space might be more natural in German. While not incorrect, it sounds slightly awkward. Consider using a space instead of a hyphen.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{organizationName}} Editor in derselben Registerkarte öffnen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ανοίξτε το πρόγραμμα επεξεργασίας {{organizationName}} στην ίδια καρτέλα' is a bit literal. A more natural Greek phrasing would be 'Άνοιγμα του προγράμματος επεξεργασίας {{organizationName}} στην ίδια καρτέλα' or 'Να ανοίξει το πρόγραμμα επεξεργασίας {{organizationName}} στην ίδια καρτέλα'.  'Άνοιγμα' functions as a noun (opening) and is often preferred when referring to an action or operation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Άνοιγμα του προγράμματος επεξεργασίας {{organizationName}} στην ίδια καρτέλα

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Abra el editor {{organizationName}} en la misma pestaña" is a literal translation that sounds unnatural in Spanish. A more natural phrasing would be "Abrir el editor de {{organizationName}} en la misma pestaña" or "Abrir el editor {{organizationName}} en la pestaña actual".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abrir el editor de {{organizationName}} en la misma pestaña

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ouvrir l'éditeur {{organizationName}} dans le même onglet' is a literal translation and sounds awkward in French. It lacks natural flow. 'Ouvrir' is correct but the phrasing after 'Ouvrir' could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ouvrir l'éditeur {{organizationName}} dans un nouvel onglet

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Նույն ներդիրում բացեք {{organizationName}} խմբագիրը' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab'. 'Ներդիրում' doesn't directly relate to a 'tab' in this context. A better translation would convey the idea of opening in the same tab or window.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Բացեք {{organizationName}} խմբագիրը նույն աշխատասեղանի վրա' or 'Բացեք {{organizationName}} խմբագիրը նույն էկրանին' which more accurately reflects opening in the same tab/window.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '같은 탭에서 {{organizationName}} 편집기를 여세요' is not the most natural way to express 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab' in Korean. The verb '여세요' (yeoseyo - open) feels slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would be something like '같은 탭에서 {{organizationName}} 편집기를 엽니다' or '같은 탭에서 {{organizationName}} 편집기를 띄웁니다'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 같은 탭에서 {{organizationName}} 편집기를 엽니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses a space before the curly brackets in {{organizationName}}, which is not standard formatting. It should be directly adjacent to the curly braces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເປີດຕົວບັນນາຈັກ{{organizationName}} ໃນແທັບດຽວກັນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Otwórz edytor {{organizationName}} w tej samej karcie' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab'. The word order and phrasing could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otwórz edytor {{organizationName}} w nowej karcie

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Abra o editor {{organizationName}} na mesma guia' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab'. A more accurate translation would be something like 'Abrir o editor {{organizationName}} na mesma aba' or 'Abrir o editor {{organizationName}} na aba atual'. The current translation sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abrir o editor {{organizationName}} na mesma aba

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Abra o editor {{organizationName}} na mesma guia' is not the most natural phrasing in Portuguese. While technically correct, it could be improved to sound more idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abra o editor {{organizationName}} na aba atual

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Откройте редактор {{organizationName}} на той же вкладке' is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Открыть редактор {{organizationName}} в той же вкладке' or 'Открыть редактор {{organizationName}} в той же вкладке'.  'Откройте' is an imperative form which isn't necessary. It's implied by the context of a setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Открыть редактор {{organizationName}} в той же вкладке

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'තබන්න {{organizationName}} සංස්කාරකයම ටැබයේ විවෘත කරන්න' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab'. The use of 'තබන්න' (tabanna - to place) is not appropriate here.  A more accurate rendering would convey the action of *opening* rather than placing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: විවෘත කරන්න {{organizationName}} සංස්කාරකයම එකම ටැබ් එකේ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of 'එකම' (ekama - same) seems slightly awkward. It's better placed directly before 'ටැබ් එකේ' to emphasize the 'same' tab.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: විවෘත කරන්න {{organizationName}} සංස්කාරකයම එකම ටැබ් එකේ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Otvorte redaktor {{organizationName}} v tej istej záložke' doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab'. A more accurate translation would specify that the editor should be opened *in the current* tab, or that it should open as a new tab in the same window.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otvorte editor {{organizationName}} v rovnakej karte

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak sentence structure could be improved for a more natural flow. The placement of 'v tej istej záložke' feels slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otvorte editor {{organizationName}} v rovnakej karte

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Odpri urejevalnik {{organizationName}} v istem zavihku' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Slovenian. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Odprite urejevalnik {{organizationName}} v zavihek' or 'Odpri {{organizationName}} urejevalnik v zavihek'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odprite urejevalnik {{organizationName}} v zavihek

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Отвори {{organizationName}} уређивач у истој картици" is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Serbian.  'Уређивач' (editor) feels clunky. A more natural phrasing would use a word that conveys the action of opening a window/panel for editing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Отвори прозор за уређивање {{organizationName}} у истој картици

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'картици' (kartici) for 'tab' while technically correct, might be perceived as too technical. A more common word for tab in a browser context might be better.  However, without more context, it is hard to determine the most appropriate term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Отвори прозор за уређивање {{organizationName}} у истој улази

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Aynı sekmede {{organizationName}} düzenleyicisini açın' is a bit literal. A more natural Turkish phrasing would be '{{organizationName}} düzenleyicisini aynı sekmede aç'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{organizationName}} düzenleyicisini aynı sekmede aç

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Відкрити редактор {{organizationName}} на тій самій вкладці' is not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab'. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward. A more fluent translation would be 'Відкрити редактор {{organizationName}} у тій самій вкладці' or 'Відкрити редактор {{organizationName}} в тій самій вкладці'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Відкрити редактор {{organizationName}} у тій самій вкладці

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Chinese translation uses '选项卡' which is more formal than typically used in UI elements. '标签' might be more appropriate for a tab in a browser/editor context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 在同一标签中打开 {{organizationName}} 编辑器
